section.title: Choosing an installation size
section.para:
You can choose between two
installation size
installation sizes:

listitem.para:
A basic &MiKTeX; installation
Basic MiKTeX
which gets you started.

section.para: Choose Basic &MiKTeX;, if you have to download over a slow Internet connection, or if you want to conserve disk space. Missing files can be installed later (in the course of use).

section.title: Shared vs. private installation
section.para:
You have the option to create a shared &MiKTeX;
shared installation
private installation
installation. Use this option if you are the administrator of your computer and if you want to install &MiKTeX; for all users. This option is not available if you are logged into a limited user account.

section.title: Installing a basic &MiKTeX; system
section.para: Get the Basic &MiKTeX; Installer (&basicmiktexexefile;) from the download page and run it.

section.title: Installing a complete &MiKTeX; system
Download
section.para: Start the installer and choose Download MiKTeX on the task page. You will be prompted to choose an installation size (choose Complete MiKTeX), a download source and a destination directory.

section.title: Install
section.para: Start the installer a second time and choose Install &MiKTeX; on the task page.
